meanings.sent1: He tried to recoup the money he spent on the broken phone by working extra hours.
meanings.sent2: The fundraiser aimed to recoup the funds lost during the charity event.
meanings.sent3: The chef recouped the money spent on the burnt dish by offering a free dessert.
meanings.sent4: The athlete recouped the time lost due to injury by training diligently.
meanings.sent5: Despite setbacks, she managed to recoup the money spent on the failed marketing campaign.
